component:
io.github.tridentu.tridentu2 Tridentu 2 GNU/Linux An OS built from LFS
Tridentu 2 is a free operating system (OS) for your computer that is built from LFS. LFS is Linux From Scratch, a book that provides a way to build a Linux OS literally from scratch. An operating system is the set of basic programs and utilities that make your computer run.
...
https://tridentu.github.io/ GPL
Tridentu Group
...
The next release of Tridentu 2.
